title: Ramadan trending staycations in UAE: Book before Suhoor for exclusive discounts
summary_full: Ramadan staycations are booming in the UAE for 2026, offering a tranquil escape before suhoor. This trend blends family time, reflection and unique culinary experiences like sunrise meals in scenic spots. It highlights a shift towards meaningful domestic travel, prioritising cultural engagement and relaxation over traditional holidays during the holy month.
